algorithm_technique: Dijkstra's algorithm on a grid with alternating movement costs
problem_summary_simple: Find minimum time to traverse a grid with alternating 1s and 2s movement costs between adjacent rooms.
problem_summary_technical: Dijkstra's algorithm on a grid where movement cost alternates between 1 and 2 based on the sum of coordinates.
key_insights: This is a variation of Dijkstra's algorithm where edge weights are dynamic.
The movement cost depends on the parity of the sum of the current cell's coordinates.
The cost to enter a room is the maximum of the room's opening time and the current time, plus the movement cost.
